articles.author: Paul Wiseman
articles.title: What to know about Trump’s plan to give Americans a $2,000 tariff dividend - AP News
articles.description: President Donald Trump boasts that his tariffs protect American industries, lure factories to the United States, raise money for the federal government and give him diplomatic leverage. Now, he’s claiming they can finance a windfall for American families, too…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Donald Trump boasts that his tariffs protect American industries, lure factories to the United States, raise money for the federal government and give him diplomatic leverag… [+3393 chars]
